## Changes in v1.4.6

- **Fix:** Resolved "Cannot find module @polar-sh/sdk" error when opening the app (packaged builds).
- Menu button now works correctly (overlay starts interactive).
- Watchdog disabled for now.
- Screenshot: fewer false "blank" results; tries all windows when screen is protected (e.g. Lockdown).
- Input placeholder always shows "Ask Jarvis, / for commands".
- App name back to Jarvis (Lockdown launcher and rescue use Jarvis).
- In-app updates supported for users on previous versions.

---

**Download:** **Jarvis-1.4.6-arm64.dmg** from Assets below. Drag Jarvis to your Applications folder.

**In-app update:** Users on earlier versions can update via Menu â†’ Check for updates.
